Item.Description:
NEW sealed in original retail packaging 


Your mobile office is now unified like never before with the next generation Voyager PRO UC system. With revolutionary Smart Sensor technology, you can answer a call by simply putting on your headset, and when you do, it automatically updates your softphone presence so colleagues know your availability--and that’s just the beginning from a proven performer in delivering premium sound quality and comfort.

Experience it all with a headset that's a proven performer in delivering premium sound quality and comfort. The Plantronics Voyager PRO+ improves on the award-winning audio and design of Voyager PRO, defining a new vision for hands-free convenience. Listen to your favorite music and podcasts, or stream GPS directions from your mobile, thanks to A2DP technology. Take advantage of Plantronics Vocalyst voice and text services (subscription required) to manage email, check weather, and listen to news. The Voyager PRO+ will change the way you think about hands-free.

Technical Specifications

  • Connection Type: Bluetooth
  • Transmit Range: 30 feet
  • Multi-Point: Yes
  • Voice Commands: Spoken Cues
  • Enhanced Services: Plantronics Vocalyst (requires subscription)
  • Battery Power: Up to 6 hrs talk / Up to 5 days stand-by
  • Charger Type: Micro USB
  • A2DP: Yes
  • Microphones: Dual-Mic
  • Noise-Cancellation: AudioIQ2, Two noise-canceling microphones, DSP
  • Wind Noise Reduction: Windsmart Technology, Enhanced stainless steel windscreens
  • Weight: 17 grams

Posted with eBay Mobile
Item.Title: Plantronics 38885-01 Voyager PRO UC B230 Headset
